publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2754# Cathy Peattie: Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) â€”That the Parliament congratulates the Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) Ltd on the progress that it has made with promoting social inclusion through its innovatory community development degrees and invites the Scottish Executive to encourage local authorities, through funding, to review their approach to such programmes and to promote the wider adoption of this type of "apprenticeship" professional training.
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Margaret Jamieson*, Elaine Thomson*, Paul Martin*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Maureen Macmillan*, Johann Lamont*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Tavish Scott*, Trish Godman*, Brian Adam*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Richard Lochhead*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr John McAllion*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Karen Whitefield*, Cathie Craigie*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Helen Eadie*, Rhoda Grant*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2754# Linked Work and Training Trust (Central) (lodged on 18 February 2002) Elaine Smith*
